rows.label: qst630401_msg0001
rows.name: When will my father finally come home?

rows.label: qst630401_msg0002
rows.name:
My apologies, but your father is
off on a mission right now...

rows.label: qst630401_msg0003
rows.name:
But the war's over! What sort of
mission could he be on? Tell me
the truth, now! Where is he?

rows.label: qst630401_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm afraid that information
is classified, and I am not
at liberty to discuss it.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0005
rows.name: Ugh! Fine, forget you!

rows.label: qst630401_msg0006
rows.name: You're the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries, huh?

rows.label: qst630401_msg0007
rows.name:
We hired some mercs ourselves
recently, but they haven't made
it back from the field yet...

rows.label: qst630401_msg0008
rows.name:
There was a bit of trouble with
Superbia out in Temperantia, right?

rows.label: qst630401_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, we sent four really tough guys on
a surveillance mission. Just keeping an
eye on the Superbian army and that.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0010
rows.name:
But then the war never came,
and we found ourselves with
a nice, easy armistice.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0011
rows.name:
The order to withdraw was sent out,
but they're still not back... Maybe
it never reached them, I don't know.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0012
rows.name:
If we send our troops to find them, the
Superbians might well get the wrong idea.
The fighting might start up again.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0013
rows.name:
So we're stuck. We can't send anyone
out on a search mission, so we're
left hoping they'll just turn up...

rows.label: qst630401_msg0014
rows.name: Which is where you lot come in.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0015
rows.name:
We'd like to ask you to man a search
mission. Find Bonard and his men and
bring them back. What do you say?

rows.label: qst630401_msg0016
rows.name: You will? Thank you!

rows.label: qst630401_msg0017
rows.name:
We know that Bonard's squad
was over by the Holy Grail
Hammer on the first day.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0018
rows.name:
After that, though...
We've had no contact, and
they could be anywhere.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0019
rows.name:
To start with, you could head
to the Holy Grail Hammer, seeing
what you uncover from there.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0020
rows.name:
That girl from before is Bonard's
daughter, by the way. Only child.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0021
rows.name:
I sent her away, said it was
classified... But she's just as
worried as I am, if not more.

rows.label: qst630401_msg0022
rows.name:
For her sake, I hope you
come back with good news...
